mapper.select: SELECT T_REVIEW.BOARD_UID ,T_REVIEW.NUMBER ,CASE WHEN T_REVIEW.CAT_CD = 01 THEN 'Nike' WHEN T_REVIEW.CAT_CD = 02 THEN 'Adidas' WHEN T_REVIEW.CAT_CD = 03 THEN 'Converse' ELSE 'etc' END CAT_CD ,T_REVIEW.TITLE ,T_REVIEW.CONTENTS ,T_REVIEW.RSGSTR_ID ,T_REVIEW.VISIT_CNT ,DATE_FORMAT(T_REVIEW.RSGST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RSGST_DT ,T_REVIEW.USE_YN ,(SELECT SAVED_FILE_NM FROM T_FILE WHERE FILE_NO = T_REVIEW.FILE_NO) AS SAVED_FILE_NM FROM T_REVIEW INNER JOIN ( SELECT CAT_CD ,GROUP_CONCAT(NUMBER ORDER BY RSGST_DT DESC) GROUPED_NUMBER FROM T_REVIEW GROUP BY CAT_CD) GROUP_MAX ON T_REVIEW.CAT_CD = GROUP_MAX.CAT_CD WHERE T_REVIEW.USE_YN = 'Y' AND FIND_IN_SET(NUMBER,GROUPED_NUMBER) BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY T_REVIEW.CAT_CD, T_REVIEW.RSGST_DT DESC

SELECT BOARD_UID ,NUMBER ,CASE WHEN CAT_CD = 01 THEN 'Nike' WHEN CAT_CD = 02 THEN 'Adidas' WHEN CAT_CD = 03 THEN 'Converse' ELSE 'etc' END CAT_CD ,TITLE ,CONTENTS ,RSGSTR_ID ,VISIT_CNT ,DATE_FORMAT(RSGST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RSGST_DT ,USE_YN ,(SELECT SAVED_FILE_NM FROM T_FILE WHERE FILE_NO = TR.FILE_NO) AS SAVED_FILE_NM FROM T_REVIEW TR WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
AND (TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') OR CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%'))
AND CAT_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{catCd},'%')
ORDER BY RSGST_DT DESC
SELECT CAT_CD ,CASE WHEN CAT_CD = 01 THEN 'Nike' WHEN CAT_CD = 02 THEN 'Adidas' WHEN CAT_CD = 03 THEN 'Converse' ELSE 'All' END AS BRND_NM FROM T_REVIEW WHERE USE_YN ='Y' GROUP BY CAT_CD
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_REVIEW WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_UID ,NUMBER ,CAT_CD ,TITLE ,CONTENTS ,RSGSTR_ID ,VISIT_CNT ,DATE_FORMAT(RSGST_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') AS RSGST_DT ,FILE_NO ,USE_YN FROM T_REVIEW WHERE NUMBER=#{number}
SELECT FILE_NO ,ORIGIN_FILE_NM ,SAVED_FILE_NM ,SAVED_FILE_PATH ,ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM T_FILE WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT BRND_NM, GD_NM, PAST_LENGTH, NEW_LENGTH, CASE WHEN SIZE = 's' THEN 'Small' WHEN SIZE = 'm' THEN 'Fitness' WHEN SIZE = 'l' THEN 'Large' END AS SIZE, T_REVIEW_RPL.RSGSTR_ID FROM T_REVIEW_RPL JOIN T_PRD ON T_REVIEW_RPL.GD_CD=T_PRD.GD_CD JOIN T_BRAND ON T_REVIEW_RPL.CAT_CD=T_BRAND.CAT_CD WHERE T_REVIEW_RPL.NUMBER = #{number} ORDER BY BRND_NM ASC
